## Stream interface

The stream config defined in [TemplateConfig.stream](./sites-scripts.templateconfig.stream.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Stream
```

| Property                                               | Modifiers | Type                                                                                   | Description                                                 |

| [$id](./sites-scripts.stream._id.md)                   |           | string                                                                                 | The identifier of the stream                                |
| [fields](./sites-scripts.stream.fields.md)             |           | string\[\]                                                                             | The fields to apply to the stream                           |
